record.field: Verify and check for safety in pregnancy the prescribed drug

Verify and check for safety in pregnancy the prescribed drug


During the prescription process, GNU Health checks whether the patient is in childbearing age.


In the case the person is a female, it will check whether they might be in childbearing age.


If that is the case, the health professional must check the field "Prescription Verified" to be able to proceed.


For each drug, GNU Health allows to enter the current pregnancy safety category / fetal risk (A,B,C,D,X,N)


Command: RX
